name: Omari's Crypt
description:
Omari's Crypt immerses players in a first-person exploration of Pharaoh Omari's burial site, which was constructed over 5000 years ago. During the initial game play cinematic, players are presented with breath-taking views of Pharaoh Omari's pyramid after journeying down the Nile River. Players can investigate the Pyramid's vast exterior before making their way through to the crypt's entrance. From here, Players must cautiously traverse a maze of tunnels and chambers as they descend further and discover buried secrets from the crypt's mysterious history, unaware of the horrors that await them. Clues to the crypt's secrets can be found throughout each level, as well as relics of previous explorers.

Martyn Evans -  Level Design/Asset Creation

Bradley Seymour - Programmer/Level Design/Asset Creation

Jessy Gilligan - Level Design/Asset Creation
